Articles.Content:
Captured an asteroide for contract, as I had to re dock with it contract ended up invalide, think it was not undisturbed as I had grabbed it before.
However this was not the real problem, the problem is that mining is suddenly broken, drill connect, start asteroide harvest,  get the drill dust. drill show an efficiency rating and mass of asteroid go down, but get no ore or other stuff. This worked earlier, managed to fill up the fuel tank after doing the Minmus intercept burn but then I wanted to fill up ore tank i had stopped working. 
No changes in game as in new mods during that time. 

releasing and re-clawing don't help. neiter do restart of game. 

1.31, OSE workshop and planetary bases is the two mods who might affect this I think.
Is this an know issue?
